description.default: The SAP client ID to connect to the SAP system. The SAP backends' client (or 'Mandant') into which to log in. It's a number ranging from 000 to 999. Used separately in IDoc transactions.

label.description: The SAP client ID to connect to the SAP system. The SAP backends' client (or 'Mandant') into which to log in. It's a number ranging from 000 to 999. Used separately in IDoc transactions.
